name: Reliquary of Time
description:
✧Reliquary of Time✧

You're the final boss... 

...and generations of heroes are after your reliquary.

Reliquary of Time is a short, narrative driven turn-based combat game where the consequences of your actions affect your chances of escaping a reoccurring time loop. Fight against a band of heroes and their descendants through time as you try to break the time loop and return to normal!

Made from scratch in 3 days for Mini Jam 113!

Programming: Michael McEachern

Story: Andrew McEachern

Art: Mandi Lynn (https://shyvisual.itch.io/)

Music: GeoffreyBurch, Lightyeartraxx, Zen Man from Pixabay, From The Depths by Defrini
